storyInfo: The true playwrights behind the farce gather in the now-abandoned bar. At sunrise, old friends stand side-by-side, watching a new future slowly dawn.

attributes.content: Please wait here a moment,
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Mr. Rat King.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Thank you very much. You are dismissed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And excellent marksmanship back there, by the way.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: The praise is much appreciated. And do forgive my rudeness, but you were not injured at all, were you?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Of course not. However, if you ever had any genuine murderous intent towards me...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Then I never would have had a chance to pull the trigger. You need not be so humble, sir, the Master of the House and myself are well acquainted with your past.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Ah, time is a cruel mistress. Tonight once again reminded me of that fact.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: When one toys with the power to terrify others, one risks seeing himself swallowed whole. Playing with those children full of piss and vinegar saw my precious coat destroyed.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Only your coat?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Needlework is awfully difficult for me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You have completed your task, Messenger. Return to your master, let him feel at ease that his thing is done.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Indeed. But the Master of the House may well want to see you in person. For now, I shall take my leave.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...Hm. This place is a disaster. Clearly the work of that penguin.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Ooh, there's an intact bottle of booze here. Mm, looks like some quality stuff.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Would you like a drink?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: A bottle that the Rat King himself deigned to bend over and pick up? How could I refuse?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Listen to you, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Chief. It's been a long time since I heard you call me that.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And here you are, participating in this little game yourself. I thought you would just pawn it off on Penguin Logistics...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: An old man should look like an old man, be kind, and join in fun with the children.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Heh heh. I still don't feel like you're truly aging. Maybe it's because your daughter looks more and more like you every day. The young you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I don't know how far she can go. Sometimes we need to let them go, but I think we haven't done a very good job on that front.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Even if they choose a dead end?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Even if they choose a dead end.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hah. But then, what path truly takes you that far? And who decides? The Catastrophes?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Maybe you really have gotten old, Lin.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You know why I pay so much attention to that little Messenger? It's because I think they may have something in common.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Now that I think of it, maybe you shouldn't be here in person, Chief.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There are some 'Lungmen citizens' who are 'casually passing by,' we are well aware.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: *Sigh*
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Even the Rat King sighs.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There are many things that merit a sigh. I just happened to pick one, with gusto.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Maybe it is time to retire.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's no good. Lungmen still needs her Rat King.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But she can do without Lin. Neither of us are as we once were.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: No matter. I will persevere until the day Lungmen is ready to go without the Rat King.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That'll be the day my daughter is truly grown.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Is that what you think?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I am her father. And the Rat King of the slums. And once, I was your friend, Lin Gray.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Maybe I can't make a decision. Maybe I've already made many mistakes.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...You are still brooding over the past, Lin.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: When you took Lungmen back for us, I promised you I would stay in the shadow of Wei Yenwu. You need not ever again touch these filthy old alleyways.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Yes. It's been so long. I made that promise, and we have a Rat King.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You've sacrificed much.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Spare us the crocodile tears. As if I was innocent? When were we ever innocent?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...You kept your promise, old friend. But you also did not hide your misery.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is that because of your daughter?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I could not make it clearer to you why I would use such a roundabout way of expelling those Siracusans.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There are many troublesome foes. At least I can trust you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Trust and exploitation are of a kind. Each have a time and place. We must be practical.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...You used to hate this kind of talk.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's remarkable. We have had so many long-awaited reunions tonight, and yet not a single one has been satisfying.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Don't talk like that. Look, we're two old friends enjoying some scintillating conversation just after Sauin. Let's just relax.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As you wish. Phew, it's gotten cold. I don't suppose you had time to light a candle for our old comrades in arms?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That doesn't take much time at all. As soon as you left, there I was.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...I just can't imagine Wei Yenwu bringing flowers to a grave all by his lonesome.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I won't attend your funeral, but maybe I'll bring a bouquet to your grave. Then you'll know.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...Could you recall a person who saved your life, and for the trouble was never again able to walk?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There are more such people than we could count. The ones who fought side by side with us, gave their lives for us.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And I will never forget any of them, even for a second.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...Your eyes never change. Maybe, just maybe you will live a long time.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: There's a trick to these things.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Either way, you have to live a while longer.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll take that as a Sauin blessing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: RAGGEDY-ASS! OLD! RAT!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hm?!
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Marvelous flying kick, Mr. Emperor, but let's show the Rat King a bit more respect.
Good evening, or is it good morning now, Chief Wei?
It was an eventful evening, Mr. Eurill. There were some twists and turns, but everyone got what they needed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I thought you'd be waiting in the VIP room for everything to resolve itself comfortably.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: To toss my son into imminent danger while I wait warm and comfy in the VIP room for Chief Wei to report back? Does that sound like me?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Who're you callin' imminent danger?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Take it easy, Emperor.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I ain't even started with your mummy lookin' ass, old man!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What's to be so upset about? It's just one little hole in your belly I put.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Little?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Put a little gauze in it. Are you dead? You can't die. Where's the harm?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: *KACHAK* You ruined my favorite tee, old man, cost me a shitload of paper, and then you come around and do me like this? Hmm?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Let it go, Mr. Emperor, my company will cover all of the day's expenses.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: You shut your mouth. This ain't about money.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Answer me this, Eurill, why'd your man shoot a blank at the Rat King, but this stanky old bastard made a real ass shish kabob outta me?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I couldn't resist.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...You're playing a dangerous game here, Emperor.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: My hand slipped.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Now now. Chief Wei is present. Let's clear the air of this murderous energy.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: In any case, the evening's total economic damages don't come anywhere near those of a single Catastrophe, so where's the problem?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is a fine place to cut your teeth. All those young ladies, the so-called Messengers, certainly don't make an easy go of it.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But if I might offer one piece of advice: be careful it doesn't backfire.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hah, of course! But this is my son we're talking about! Mountain Dash never backs down from a challenge!
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: You got Mostima, and all of Lungmen really, playin' tutor to your boy. You got me and this ol' stank-ass rodent as your tools. Can you really afford all this?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Tools? Nonsense.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I couldn't have foreseen those Siracusans would be so difficult to reason with. I thought they'd work with me after a good rapping on the knuckles.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Bullshit. You had 'em all figured out the moment you laid eyes on 'em.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Well I never.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Heh. How lively.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: From time to time, you take a deep breath in the outskirts and the air has a very particular taste to it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As for the Siracusans, no matter how wild the game got, your particular hand was always going to see it turn into something great.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It won't always be so. You know this better than I. But they have yet to contend with Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You may want to be mindful of Siracusa's movements.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's too bad. The crusty old mouse couldn't bring you the goods, Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...Mr. Emperor, such words could hurt one's feelings.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Now, for the offense caused to the Rat King, planned though it was, I do offer my deepest apologies.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Your man is a very impressive shot, or at least, he's good at portraying one. It makes a man wonder about his background.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Real sad. Coulda been a lot more realistic.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...You really just want to see the whole world burn.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Mr. Eurill, in consideration of the cooperation agreement between Lungmen and your company, it would be wise for you to keep your son away from the center, for the time being.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hah hah hah! Compared to the potential value of this little venture, that's no trouble at all.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: And Mr. Emperor, I trust you understand why it is Lungmen has always turned a blind eye toward the activities of Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Are you telling me it's not because of my outstanding business acumen and immense personal charisma?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...Eheh. Indeed. And I believe you see it clearer than anyone.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: *Yawn* Leave me out of it the next time you wanna do something like this! I'ma send you all an invoice and a bill or two. And you can be sure they're comin' with lots of zeroes.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Ahahahaha! That's our Emperor. He never misses a chance to extort a dollar. Maybe I should take a page from his book.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: There are few who would dare to extort the whole of Lungmen. That book is a tough read.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now then, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Yes, it's probably time for a change of venue. Everyone has their own business to attend to.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Huh? You plannin' another elaborate, multi-layered plot with six traps, eight twists, and four turns?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Would you care to invest? Together, we could move the logistics industry up to a new level. From Lungmen, we could take on all Terra!
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Nah. Honestly, I think your company's branding is as crusty as that old rat.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Ahahahaha! That's the reason! How regrettable!
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: But now I think it was your turn to speak?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Thank you, Lin.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It is not yet time for thanks.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'm not just talking about today. It's been many years.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...The sun is up.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It 's the first time for me to see the sunrise here. The last time we stood shoulder to shoulder like this, was a time of terrible bloodshed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The way the tenements in the slums wrap around each other, causing the shadows to criss cross over themselves, it's not the kind of thing you should get used to.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Then, after all these years, what is it you see here?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...Changes, Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: On that road we walked...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...there is long since no one behind us.
attributes.name: Rat King
